alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Lycoming; Potter; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 9:44PM EDT until July 20 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Clinton County in north central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... Southeastern Potter County in north central Pennsylvania... Southern Tioga County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 1030 PM EDT. * At 944 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ole Bull State Park, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Leetonia, Cedar Run and Slate Run around 1000 PM EDT. Morris around 1020 PM EDT. Arnot around 1030 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Ski Sawmill Ski Area and Mansfield University. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
